DESIGNERS: If you are not satisfied with your purchase, the item(s) can be returned for a size exchange, a store credit or a refund within the 14 days after the order is delivered.

DESIGNERS: PRE-ORDER items are advance of next seasons collection and will be delivered in the estimated date indicated in each case. Pre-orders are treated as FINAL SALE and must be paid in full at the time of order completion.
